title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
The highest Country China has 67.5 more Number of affected people (in millions) than the lowest Country Haiti.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
The highest Country China has 67.5 more Number of affected people (in millions) than the lowest Country Haiti.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of affected people (in millions) in the y axis.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Haiti.
The difference of Number of affected people (in millions) between the highest and lowest Country is 67.5.
Number of affected people (in millions) at Country China is 70.9 , second place is India at 26.18, and thirdly is Chile at 8.53.
The Country China has 4.89 times more Number of affected people (in millions) than average.
The Number of affected people (in millions) is 145.12 if we add up values of all Countrys.
